text: Razzi is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Antonio Razzi (born 1948), Italian politician * Claudia Razzi (born 1963), Italian voice actress and dubbing director * Maria Angelica Razzi, Italian sixteenth century nun and sculptor * Ottobuono di Razzi (died 1315), Italian clergyman and feudal lord, Patriarch of Aquileia * Serafino Razzi (1531–1613), Italian Dominican friar Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Razzi (surname)
